content.text: How TO - Copy Text to Clipboard
Learn how to copy text to the clipboard with JavaScript.
content.html: Learn how to copy text to the clipboard with JavaScript.

content.text: Click on the button to copy the text from the text field.
content.html: Click on the button to copy the text from the text field.

syntaxHighlighting.text: <!-- The button used to copy the text -->

content.code:
<!-- The text field -->
<input type="text" value="Hello World" id="myInput">


<!-- The button used to copy the text -->
<button onclick="myFunction()">Copy 
text</button>

syntax_highlighting.text: <!-- The button used to copy the text -->

content.code_html:
<!-- The text field -->
<input type="text" value="Hello World" id="myInput">

<!-- The button used to copy the text -->
<button onclick="myFunction()">Copy text</button>

syntax_highlighting_data.text: <!-- The button used to copy the text -->

syntaxHighlighting.text: // Copy the text inside the text field

syntax_highlighting.text: // Copy the text inside the text field

content.code_html:
function myFunction() {
  // Get the text field
  var copyText = document.getElementById("myInput");

  // Select the text field
  copyText.select();
  copyText.setSelectionRange(0, 99999); // For mobile devices

   // Copy the text inside the text field
  navigator.clipboard.writeText(copyText.value);

  // Alert the copied text
  alert("Copied the text: " + copyText.value);
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text: // Copy the text inside the text field

content.text: Display Copied Text in a Tooltip

content.code_html:
.tooltip {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}

.tooltip .tooltiptext {
  visibility: hidden;
  width: 140px;
  background-color: #555;
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 5px;
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 1;
  bottom: 150%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -75px;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
}

.tooltip .tooltiptext::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -5px;
  border-width: 5px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #555 transparent transparent transparent;
}

.tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
}
